com.mobixell.xtt.ldap
Class LDAPWorker

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.mobixell.xtt.ldap.LDAPWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
LDAPConstants, Runnable
public class LDAPWorker
extends Thread
implements LDAPConstants

LDAPWorker. Processes a connection which has been received by the LDAPServer
